Extensions
==========

PHPBench can be customized with extensions. See :doc:`customisation` for
details on creating your own extension.

Built-in Extensions
-------------------

.. toctree::
   :maxdepth: 1

   extensions/xdebug

Community Extensions
--------------------

Make a pull request on Github_ to add your extension here!

.. _Github: https://github.com/phpbench/phpbench
